Articles.Content:
I've made a few posts, but it occurred to me that I hadn't done this.

So...

Hi!

My first version of KSP was/is 23.5 bought during a Steam sale and since liberated from Steamedpowered (discovered you can just start the EXE without using Steam's client)

It's like the best parts of "Orbiter" (windows) and "Simple Rockets" (android) had a baby! I really enjoy it.

I have added MechJeb, Procedural Fairings, and KW Rocketry parts. KW came first, but I didn't like the rigid fairing sizes. MechJeb is only used to Autopilot things I have already done myself manually!

Now for the question:

I've seen the texture replacer and I have been especially (or rather solely) interested in the "helmetless kerbals" part of that mod, but it looks way complicated from the main thread I saw. Is there either a mod that ONLY does the hemet on/helmet off part OR a simple explanation of how to implement just that part?

I don't want to mess with anything else, I'd just like to have Jeb, Bob, and Bill to be able to get out of those stuffy helmets when safely inside or on Kerbin's surface.

Kerbal Attachment System

Give your Kerbals a reason to actually get out of the ship. In stock KSP, EVA has little purpose for existing.

But hey, welcome to the community!

Edited June 24, 2014 by Alshain
Welcome to the forums! Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game. Sadly, I'm not aware of any mods that fit exactly what you're looking for, but best of luck with your search.

Hey!

I'm sorry, I don't use many mods either, but I hope you find what you're looking for. There are certainly a ton of mods out there.

Good luck and have fun. Welcome to the forums!

Thanks!

I guess I may have to just go for it and try to figure it out. I'm happy with everything else, but those helmet less kerbals just look so damn cool to me....

I sure rather have that stock then the impending monitary system....:-(
